tests.name: start lines: parses the method
tests.run: npx jest -t 'start lines parses the method'

tests.name: start lines: parses the path
tests.run: npx jest -t 'start lines parses the path'

tests.name: start lines: parses the HTTP version
tests.run: npx jest -t 'start lines parses the HTTP version'

tests.name: start lines: parses empty requests
tests.run: npx jest -t 'start lines parses empty requests'

tests.name: start lines: parses requests with headers but no body
tests.run: npx jest -t 'start lines parses requests with headers but no body'

tests.name: start lines: gracefully parses requests with only a start line
tests.run: npx jest -t 'start lines gracefully parses requests with only a start line'

tests.name: start lines: parses requests containing a body
tests.run: npx jest -t 'start lines parses requests containing a body'

tests.name: behavior: returns 400 for malformed requests
tests.run: npx jest -t 'behavior returns 400 for malformed requests'

tests.name: behavior: returns 404 for non-existent files
tests.run: npx jest -t 'behavior returns 404 for non-existent files'

tests.name: behavior: returns 200 for existing files
tests.run: npx jest -t 'behavior returns 200 for existing files'
